Text:
I hope none of you people actually believes this bullshit.
The producers of this series would serve life long sentences in maximum security prisons, given I had any power.
whats the matter PetaFlux ? you feel you and your ancient , fake ideas in danger ? i wish world become clean from people like you!!!how is that feel?

It's bizarre that some people just dismiss any information or ideas, without first listening and considering.  My bro used to be into alien stuff, but he will not pay one minute of attention to this show, and he's not even a religious person.
There are no gods! Only aliens!

I always find it funny that people come onto places to slam stuff without actually providing any good reason why. If you don't like it don't bother coming around, go download and watch what you enjoy!

I personally enjoy the series and have read a lot of similar material regarding a lot of very old sites. I agree with Ashkan but would be more of the line that people need to be more educated to understand the real history of mankind... not gonna happen overnight.
@PetaFlux the only BS around here is from you what are you a loser that sit's and trolls the internet quit being a loser and go get a life

Where the Hell is TODAY's episode ???? Ancient Aliens 
Prophets and Prophecies 
S: 5 - Ep: 7 
H2 TV - 4:00am
There are no gods! Only aliens!²

Anyone who is foolish enough to believe in any form of a god would serve life long sentences in maximum security prisons, given I had any power. 

Funny how religious nuts get so offended by this series which basically is stating every religious text in existence is factual and just misinterpreted.

Yet atheist dismiss all religious texts as pure fiction yet they get less hate from religious nazis.
